text: Robert Gibson Ferguson (born 5 January 1902) was a Scottish professional footballer who played as a centre-half for Sunderland. ==References== Category:1902 births Category:Footballers from Glasgow Category:Scottish footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Queen's Park F.C. players Category:Cambuslang Rangers F.C. players Category:Sunderland A.F.C. players Category:Middlesbrough F.C. players Category:Northwich Victoria F.C. players Category:English Football League players Category:Year of death missing
title: Robert Ferguson (footballer, born 1902)
